section.heading: Exemptions—Food, drinks, or meals furnished by a senior living community

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.12 > Section 82.12.9993 82.12.999 << 82.12.9993 >> 82.12.9994 PDF RCW 82.12.9993 Exemptions — Food, drinks, or meals furnished by a senior living community. This chapter does not apply to food, drinks, or meals furnished by a senior living community to tenants as part of a rental or residency agreement for which no separate charge is made, regardless of whether the tenant is a resident for purposes of chapter 18.20 or 18.390 RCW. [ 2023 c 416 s 3 .] NOTES: Tax preference performance statement exemption — Automatic expiration date exemption — 2023 c 416: "RCW 82.32.805 and 82.32.808 do not apply to this act." [ 2023 c 416 s 4 .]
